title: It says that my email is taken even tho its not
body: So I had an old account with my main email I wanted a new account so I changed my old account email to some random email that I just created and now I want to use the old email but when I try to create an account it says that its in use when I go to recover username it says "email sent" with the account details but no email ever comes because that email is not in use.. Its been 20days like this any ideas?

replies.body: Player Support should be able to help you out, just submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Do you know how long does it usually take for them to respond?

Expect a couple days for the first response, but account recovery related tickets seem to take around a week to get everything sorted out. Times can vary dramatically depending on ticket queue and if you're able to provide enough information the first time around, just sit back and take a break and be patient, nothing else you can do.
I looked into this for you, and see that your ticket has been escalated to our account team.  They will reach out to you as soon as possible!
